LanguageData.Ammo_338Lapua_FMJ.label: .338 马格南子弹 （全金属被甲弹）
LanguageData.Ammo_338Lapua_FMJ.description: The .338 Lapua Magnum (8.6×70mm or 8.58×70mm) is a rimless, bottlenecked, centerfire cartridge developed for military long-range sniper rifles。

LanguageData.Ammo_338Lapua_HE.description: The .338 Lapua Magnum (8.6×70mm or 8.58×70mm) is a rimless, bottlenecked, centerfire cartridge developed for military long-range sniper rifles。

LanguageData.Ammo_338Lapua_Incendiary.description: The .338 Lapua Magnum (8.6×70mm or 8.58×70mm) is a rimless, bottlenecked, centerfire cartridge developed for military long-range sniper rifles。
